summary: In the 16th-century Ukraine, the Polish overlords and Ukrainian cossacks fight for control of the land but frequent Turkish invasions force them to unite against the common Turkish foe.
cast: Tony Curtis|Yul Brynner|Christine Kaufmann|Sam Wanamaker|Brad Dexter|Guy Rolfe|Perry Lopez|George Macready|Ilka Windish|Vladimir Sokoloff|Vladimir Irman|Daniel Ocko|Abraham Sofaer|Mickey Finn|Richard Rust|Ron Weyand|Vitina Marcus|John Barton|Ellen Davalos|Jimmy Dime|Duke Fishman|Paul Frees|Marv Goux|Joe Gray|Al Haskell|Chuck Hayward|Syl Lamont|Cliff Lyons|Maurice Marks|Mathew McCue|Martine Milner|Jack Raine|Cap Somers
keywords: character name as title|two word title|taras bulba character|cranberry|16th century
title: Taras Bulba
